label: 山内一豊
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: Also Yamauchi.  [He] declared for the Tokugawa side on the eve of Sekigahara [and] was given the old Chōsogabe domain on the Pacific coast of Shikoku, an area three times the size of his former holdings (p. 192). [徳川、関ヶ原、長宗我部、四国]
